title: BISSELL® BOLT™ 2-in-1 Lightweight Cordless Vacuum 12V 1313
description:
Superior suction. Powerful convenience.

A powerful clean is now available in a lightweight, cordless vacuum. The BOLT™ 2-in-1 Lightweight Cordless Vacuum is an easy-to-use cordless vacuum with a removable hand vacuum. With 12V of power, you get up to 15 minutes of run time, so you can clean little messes or full rooms. Remove the hand vacuum for quick cleanup or for above-floor surfaces. Edge bristles on the vacuum sweep debris away from edges and corners, and the included crevice tool with dusting brush attaches to the hand vacuum to help clean hard-to-reach areas. It’s the power you need in a compact design. 

    A lightweight cordless vacuum with a 2-way folding handle and removable hand vacuum to easily clean wherever dirt is
    12V battery for up to 15 minutes of cordless power
    Edge bristles and brush roll on/off switch
    180º swivel steering
    1-year limited warranty

http://www.bissell.com/bissell-bolt-2-in-1-lightweight-cordless-vacuum-12v/

transcripts: You're house is home to an ever changing checklist of activities. And with tight schedules from day to day, cleaning messes quickly and effectively is important to keep the ball rolling. The Bisseell bolt has features specifically designed to clean up the dirt wherever it may be. The swivel  steering design allows fro easy cleaning around furniture and appliances and the two way folding handle allows powerful suction to clean in hard to reach spaces. Bolt edge bristles efficiently sweep dirt out of edges and corners offering a clean and thorough clean. And for messes that don't land on the floor,  Bolt's removable hand vacuum provides powerful suction in a portable handheld device. The crevice tool directs suction power to the gaps and seams where debris collects, allowing for quick spot cleans wherever necessary. With all of these features available in one package, you can get rid of the mess and get back to the things that matter. The Bolt from Bissell
